english.segment1: Shepherd, Your sheep are weary. Cold and tired, battered and bruised and torn. Shepherd, Your sheep are hungry. We got what we wanted but we still need something more
english.segment2: Chorus: We need to hear Your voice. Whatever You might say. We just need to hear Your voice. Show us the way
english.segment3: Shepherd, Your sheep are lost. We chased our wants that we thought were needs. Now we can't get home. Shepherd, Your sheep are longing. We ate and we ran, we played and. we danced, but we're empty
english.segment7: Shepherd, these sheep are Yours. We tried to be king, but we. don't want to anymore
